Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to subsection 277(1)* of the Excise Tax Act, is pleased hereby to make the annexed Regulations prescribing certain taxes, duties and fees.

Subsection.Text: In these Regulations,

Definition.Text: general sales tax rate of a province means

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: for a participating province, the tax rate for the participating province,

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: for Quebec, the rate of tax set out in the first paragraph of section 16 of An Act respecting the Québec sales tax, R.S.Q., c. T-0.1,

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: for Manitoba, the rate of tax set out in subsection 2(1) of The Retail Sales Tax Act, C.C.S.M., c. R130,

Paragraph.Label: (c.1)
Paragraph.Text: for British Columbia, the rate of tax set out in subsection 34(1) of the Provincial Sales Tax Act, S.B.C. 2012, c. 35,

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: for Saskatchewan, the rate of tax set out in subsection 5(1) of The Provincial Sales Tax Act, R.S.S. 1978, c. P-34.1; (taux général de la taxe de vente)

Definition.Text: specified tax rate of a province means the rate that is the greater of

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the general sales tax rate of the province plus 4%. (taux de taxe déterminé)

Subsection.Text: In these Regulations, a reference to an Act of the legislature of a province is deemed to be a reference to that Act as amended.

Section.Text: The following taxes, duties and fees are prescribed for the purposes of section 154 of the Excise Tax Act:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a tax, duty or fee in respect of a transfer of real property where that tax, duty or fee is imposed by or under any of the following, namely,

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the Land Transfer Tax Act, R.S.O. 1990, c. L.6,

Subparagraph.Label: (i.1)
Subparagraph.Text: Chapter 760 of the City of Toronto Municipal Code, made under Part X of the City of Toronto Act, 2006, S.O. 2006, c. 11, Sched. A, if the tax, duty or fee would have applied to that transfer under that chapter as it read on February 1, 2008,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the Land Transfer Duties Act, R.S.Q., c. D-17,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii.1)
Subparagraph.Text: Part III.7 of the Taxation Act, R.S.Q., c. I-3,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: An Act respecting duties on transfers of immovables, R.S.Q., c. D-15.1,

Subparagraph.Label: (ix)
Subparagraph.Text: Part V of the Municipal Government Act, S.N.S. 1998, c. 18,

Subparagraph.Label: (x)
Subparagraph.Text: the Real Property Transfer Tax Act, S.N.B. 1983, c. R-2.1,

Subparagraph.Label: (xi)
Subparagraph.Text: Part III of The Tax Administration and Miscellaneous Taxes Act, C.C.S.M., c. T2,

Subparagraph.Label: (xii)
Subparagraph.Text: the Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378,

Subparagraph.Label: (xiii)
Subparagraph.Text: The Land Titles Act, 2000, S.S. 2000, c. L-5.1,

Subparagraph.Label: (xiv)
Subparagraph.Text: the Land Titles Act, R.S.A. 2000, c. L-4,

Subparagraph.Label: (xv)
Subparagraph.Text: the Real Property Transfer Tax Act, S.P.E.I. 2005, c. 49,

Subparagraph.Label: (xvi)
Subparagraph.Text: the Registration of Deeds Act, R.S.N.L. 1990, c. R-10, and

Subparagraph.Label: (xvii)
Subparagraph.Text: the City of St. John’s Municipal Taxation Act, S.N.L. 2006, c. C-17.1;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a tax imposed by the legislature of a province, under an Act referred to in the definition general sales tax rate in subsection 2(1), in respect of an item of property or a service if

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the tax is calculated as a percentage of the value or price of the property or service,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the tax is payable by the recipient of a supply of the property or service,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: the tax is not included in the value or price of the property or service for purposes of calculating any other tax under that Act in respect of that property or service, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: the total of the rates of all taxes that are imposed under that Act in respect of the property or service and calculated as a percentage of the value or price of the property or service does not exceed the specified tax rate of the province; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a tax in respect of a service or an item of property imposed by or under any of the following:

Subparagraph.Label: (viii)
Subparagraph.Text: section 330 of The Municipal Act, C.C.S.M., c. M225,

Subparagraph.Label: (viii.1)
Subparagraph.Text: subsection 442(1) of The City of Winnipeg Charter, S.M. 2002, c. 39,

Subparagraph.Label: (ix.1)
Subparagraph.Text: section 36 of The Power Corporation Act, R.S.S. 1978, c. P-19,

Subparagraph.Label: (x)
Subparagraph.Text: The Liquor Consumption Tax Act, S.S. 1979, c. L-19.1,

Subparagraph.Label: (xi)
Subparagraph.Text: section 316 of The Municipalities Act, S.S. 2005, c. M.36.1,

Subparagraph.Label: (xii)
Subparagraph.Text: subsection 2(1) of the Tourism Levy Act, R.S.A. 2000, c. T-5.5, and

Subparagraph.Label: (xiv)
Subparagraph.Text: section 2 of the Liquor Tax Act, R.S.Y. 2002, c. 141,

Subparagraph.Label: (xv)
Subparagraph.Text: the tax is calculated as a percentage of the value or price of the property or service,

Subparagraph.Label: (xvi)
Subparagraph.Text: the tax is payable by the recipient of a supply of the property or service,

Subparagraph.Label: (xvii)
Subparagraph.Text: no tax in respect of the property or service is imposed by the legislature of a province under an Act referred to in the definition general sales tax rate in subsection 2(1), and

Subparagraph.Label: (xviii)
Subparagraph.Text: the total of the rates of all taxes, each of which is

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: imposed by or under an Act of the legislature of the province in respect of the property or service,

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: calculated as a percentage of the value or price of the property or service, and

Clause.Label: (C)
Clause.Text: payable by the recipient of a supply of the property or service,

ContinuedSubparagraph.Text: does not exceed the specified tax rate of the province.
